      Methods in net.sytes.botg.array.spectrum with parameters of type WindowFunction.WindowType 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] WindowFunction.apply(WindowFunction.WindowType wt, double[] x)
      applies the WindowType wt on the input vector x and
      returns the weighted result as double[]

      returns null if wt was not defined yet
      double WindowFunction.apply(WindowFunction.WindowType wt, int i, int n, double x_i)
      applies the WindowType wt for a single sample x_i at index i of a window of length n
      double[] WindowFunction.generate(WindowFunction.WindowType wt, int n)
      generates a window of size n for WindowType wt

      returns null if wt was not defined yet
      double WindowFunction.generate(WindowFunction.WindowType wt, int i, int n)
      generates a single window weight of the WindowType wt for the specified index i in window of length n

      returns -1.0 if WindowType was not defined yet
